ing: 1 package McCormickÂ® Spinach Dip Seasoning Mix
1/2 cup cooked and shredded fresh Maine lobster meat
des: "Every bite of this six-ingredient dip is filled with luscious lobster flavor. Mix sour cream, mayo, lemon juice and McCormickÂ® Spinach Dip Mix together. Gently fold in lobster meat and top with scallions. Serve with water crackers and score big at this weekend's tailgate or football party."
ins:
Stir sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, and seasoning mix in medium bowl until well blended. Add lobster meat; gently stir to blend. Cover.
Refrigerate at least 1 hour to blend flavors. Stir dip and sprinkle with green onions before serving. Serve with water crackers.
